00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );

00108                         return( $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , $Condition ) );

00174             function                create( $Record )
00175             {
00176                   try
00177                   {
00178                         $MasterLink = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'master_type:command;master_id:integer' );
00179                         
00180                         $Record = array( 'value' => 0 );
00181                         
00182                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00183                         
00184                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00185                         
00186                         $Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00187                         $Link->create_link( 
00188                               get_field( $MasterLink , 'master_id' ) , $id , 
00189                               get_field( $MasterLink , 'master_type' ) , 'rating'
00190                         );
00191                         
00192                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00193                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_rating' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00194                         
00195                         return( $id );
00196                   }
00197                   catch( Exception $e )
00198                   {
00199                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00200                   }
00201             }

00225             function                update( $id , $Record )
00226             {
00227                   try
00228                   {
00229                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00230                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'value:float' , 'allow_not_set' );
00231 
00232                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00233                         
00234                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00235                         {
00236                               $this->Database->update( 
00237                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00238                               );
